panels.title: Activity end to end processing time

targets.expr: sum by(global_ratelimit_collection, global_ratelimit_key, global_ratelimit_type) (rate(global_ratelimiter_allowed_requests{is_primary="true", cadence_service="cadence_frontend", operation="GlobalRatelimiter", global_ratelimit_key=~"$domain"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(global_ratelimit_collection, global_ratelimit_key, global_ratelimit_type) (rate(global_ratelimiter_rejected_requests{is_primary="true", cadence_service="cadence_frontend", operation="GlobalRatelimiter", global_ratelimit_key=~"$domain"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Service API Latency (TODO exclude long-poll APIs)
